title: End User IDs
description: Condensed, normalized encapsulation of all end user identifiers. NOTE: At least one of the fields is required.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/mcid.title: Adobe Marketing Cloud ID
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/mcid.description: A unique identifier from Adobe Marketing Cloud.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/aaid.title: Adobe Analytics Cloud End User IDs
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/aaid.description: Adobe Analytics Cloud extension to End User IDs.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/aacustom.title: Adobe Analytics Cloud Custom End User IDs
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/aacustom.description: An Adobe Analytics custom identifier passed in on a hit.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/acid.title: Adobe Campaign End User IDs
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/acid.description: Adobe Campaign extension to End User IDs.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/tntid.title: Adobe Target End User IDs
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/tntid.description: Adobe Target extension to End User IDs.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/adcloud.title: Adobe AdCloud End User IDs
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/adcloud.description: Adobe Adcloud extension to End User IDs.

.+://.+.description: The identifier, including data source (`@id` must be identical to the property value), foreign ID, and confidence.
